name: The Roots Of Gaming
description:
This is game made for the 2023 Global Game Jam site in Sofia, Bulgaria

Experience a blast from the past with this nostalgic adventure! In this small game jam creation made by three talented developers, you'll journey through 6 classic levels, each one inspired by a classic video game. Start with the timeless classic Pong, then explore the maze of Pac-Man. Enjoy the iconic 8-bit graphics and familiar sounds of Super Mario, then brace yourself for the intense action of Wolfenstein 3D. Get ready for a creepy and suspenseful journey in Silent Hill, then prepare for the ultimate showdown in Mortal Kombat. This game is perfect for anyone who loves classic video games and wants to relive some of the most iconic moments in gaming history.
